title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 129.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 129.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of these standards is to
provide objective guidelines for the fair and uniform treatment of crime
victims by the Unified Court System in order to encourage increased public
cooperation and support of the criminal justice process, improve the overall
effectiveness of the criminal justice system as it concerns crime victims and
the public in general and help ensure that courts in the Unified Court System
treat crime victims and witnesses with dignity and appropriate
understanding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
129.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
